department: Public Works and Government Services (SPAC) / PSPC
short_summary: Roof replacement at RCMP Gabriola Detachment
description: Police facility needs a new roof and structural upgrades
full_summary:
================================ployment of Gabriola Island Roof Replacement
================================

### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number (Numéro de la sollicitation)**: WS3611783321
* **Amendment Number (Numéro de modification)**: 1
* **Publication Date (Date de publication)**: November 8, 2022
* **Closing Date (Date limite)**: November 25, 2022, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date (Date de début prévue du contrat)**: January 6, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date (Date de fin prévue du contrat)**: June 30, 2023

### Contract Overview

The Government of Canada is soliciting bids for the roof replacement and structural upgrades of RCMP Gabriola Detachment, located at 525 South Road, Gabriola Island, BC. The successful contractor will be awarded a contract to perform the necessary work in a timely and professional manner.

### Requirements and Specifications

The project consists of:

* Roof replacement
* Structural upgrades

The bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Trade Agreements

The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contact Information

* Name: Brandie Klyne (TPSGC/PWGSC)
